text: John Lavery (born 1877) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Burton Swifts F.C. players Category:Hebburn Argyle F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: John Lavery (footballer, born 1877)
